name: EPQ game MVP
description:
This is the minimum viable product (MVP) for my EPQ school project. I am making this download page so that I can share it and get feedback for the final product.

Please note that because this is an MVP it is very bare bones and doesn't have sound or any other polish.

Despite that I really hope you enjoy!

Changelog:

v0.2 - Added a win screen at the end which I forgot to add.

v0.3 - Added a few sound effects and music tracks (very unfinished and glitchy)
